column2: eing  aggrieved  by  the  said  order,  an  application  has  been  made  by  the

column1: Petitioner to the Board to review or set aside the said order marked P2 under
the  powers  vested  on  the  Board  by  virtue  of  Section  54(1)  of  the  Debt
Conciliation Board Ordinance. The Debt Conciliation Board by its order dated
17.09.2020 (P3) has refused the said application on the basis that Section 54
of the said Ordinance had not provided provisions to reconsider its own order
delivered in respect of possession.
